scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This addition to the Hardy Cross Dillard papers was given to the Law Library by Mortimer Caplin in March of 1988 and consists of two items. The first is a Dillard memorandum written around 1942 for the instructors at the School of Military Government which was organized by Dillard. The other item is a 1988 talk about Dillard that Caplin gave to a group of prospective law students, candidates for scholarships in Dillard's honor.
